project.echo: Crashlytics target to be invoked prior to building any Android artifacts.
Cleans up stale Crashlytics resource files and attempts to upload any cached deobfuscation files.
Crashlytics target to be invoked prior to compiling Android artifacts. Generates
Crashlytics target to be invoked after the packaging task is complete. Cleans up Crashlytics-generated
resource files. Caches and uploads deobfuscation files to Crashlytics servers.
